name: Square shooter (itch) (356Games)
description:
Complete levels by destroying red squares Control:

"W", "A" and "A" - jump, go left, go right, and "S" - jump, but only to the ceiling. 

 The "F" key toggles gravity. 

 You can also exit to the main menu by pressing the Esc key. 

 If you like the game, then you can donate using the card number: 5536 9177 2048 7633 MasterCard. 

 If you find any bug, then write about it in the comments, and I will try to fix it.
